8 bit.gadget: Both pretty good. Cheat cartridge 90% of time, Extra Credits in heist.
8 bit.starpower: Boosted booster 99% of time. Speed vs snipers and counters some times.

amber.gadget: Dancing Flames. Fire Starters if sniper matchup.
amber.gear: Reload Speed and Gadget Charge/Sticky Oil/Vision.

angelo.gadget: Stinging Flight 99% of time. Master Fletcher still good in certain matchups+maps
angelo.gear: Shield and Damage. Health is also good.

barley.gadget: Herbal Tonic easy to abuse (teammates standing in similar area or with gas in Knockout).
barley.gear: Any two of damage, gadget, and shield.

bea.gadget: Rattled Hive. Honey Molasses if against snipers.
bea.starpower: Honeycomb more powerful. Insta Beaload if you're not confident in your aim.

belle.gadget: Nest egg most of the time. Reverse polarity ok on some maps.
belle.gear: Reload and Shield. Damage against tanks or in Heist.

berry.gadget: Friendship is Great. Healthy Additives in Heist (does 20% of safe).
berry.tips: Attack is impact + damage zone after. Damage zone doesn't stack. Weak vs tanks

bibi.starpower: Home run 99% of time. Batting stance sometimes on grassy maps + vs tanks.

bo.gadget: Super totem 99% of time. Tripwire good in brawl ball + to break open map.
bo.starpower: Snare a Bear. Circling Eagle for weird bush maps (Cavern Churn).

brock.gadget: Rocket fuel 99% of time. Rocket laces okay vs aggro.
brock.starpower: More Rockets! Rocket No. 4 can be good in Knockout or Bounty but hard to fully utilize.
brock.gear: Reload and shield. Damage instead of shield in heist.

buzz.gadget: Reserve Buoy. X-Ray-Shades is very good on grassy maps.
buzz.starpower: Eyes Sharp. Other one okay vs tanks
buzz.gear: Damage and Shield/Health (if you're good at surviving).

byron.gadget: Shot in the arm better vs sharpshooters. Booster shot better vs aggro.
byron.starpower: Malaise. Injection if you're healing behind a tank.
byron.gear: Shield and gadget. Damage instead if you don't take shot in the arm.

carl.gadget: Flying Hook. Heat Ejector is good against tanks and does a lot of damage in Heist.

charlie.gadget: Spiders unless enemy has piercing attacks. Personal Space is underrated if you learn how to use it.
charlie.starpower: Digestive better in tank meta, but both are good.

chester.gadget: Candy beans. Other is fine but both gadgets are mid
chester.gear: Gadget Charge and Damage. Vision and Speed for grassy maps.

chuck.gadget: Rerouting good for setting final post (put down post near where you intend final post to be, super over there, use gadget, place down final post). Ghost Train good on weird maps (Parallel Plays).
chuck.starpower: Tickets Please! Most of the time you don't need the extra stop from Pit Stop.
chuck.gear: Damage and shield. Gadget if you are using ghost train. Can swap health for shield in non-heist

collette.starpower: Push It better in tank meta. Mass Tax for Heist.

colt.gadget: Speedloader. Silver bullet good vs walls/throwers.
colt.starpower: Slick Boots for movement/juking, Magnum Special for aiming/melting people.

cordelius.gadget: Replanting more versatile. Poison Mushroom for noob stomping.

crow.gadget: Both gadgets underwhelming. Slowing Toxin better.
crow.starpower: Extra Toxic. Carrion Crow better for Heist since it works on safe.
crow.gear: Gadget Charge and Enduring Toxins. Grassy map try Shield and Speed.

darryl.gadget: Recoiling Rotator needed for Heist (where you most likely will play this brawler) and super cycling. Tar Barrel better in general.
darryl.starpower: Rolling Reload. Both options are terrible.

draco.gadget: Last Stand is fundamentally broken. Upper Cut is good but overshadowed.
draco.starpower: Shredding. Expose is good but normal form is terrible.
draco.tips: Pairs great with Kit, Byron when supering. Great for when pressure is needed (hot zone, etc.)

edgar.gadget: Let's Fly. Hardcore in passive game modes like Duels.
edgar.starpower: Hard landing vs squishy. Fisticuffs vs tanks

el primo.gadget: Suplex suplement to enhance ability to counter bibi, buzz, etc. Asteroid belt okay on some maps or vs throwers.
el primo.starpower: El Fuego. Meteor Rush good if it's giving skill issue.

eve.starpower: Unnatural Order. Neither star power is worth buying.

fang.gadget: Both good. Corn-fu to stop healing + control. Roundhouse to confirm kills.
fang.starpower: Divine Soles better competitive in Knockout and Bounty. Fresh Kicks better against bad players.

frank.gadget: Active Noise Canceling. Irresistible Attraction still good though.

gale.gadget: Twister. Spring Ejector good for certain maps (Kaboom Canyon or exposing enemies in bushy map choke points).
gale.starpower: Blustery Blow is good with hypercharge and countering tanks.
gale.gear: Damage and Shield. Speed and Vision for grassy maps.

gene.gadget: Vengeful vs long range. Lamp blowout brawl ball or vs tanks
gene.starpower: Magic puffs a little better. Spirit slap good with hyper
gene.gear: Talk to the Hand and Vision. Shield or Health instead of Vision on open maps.

gray.starpower: Fake Injury on ko/bounty. New perspective elsewhere
gray.gear: Damage and Gadget Charge. Shield instead of Damage if running Fake Injury.

griff.starpower: Business Resilience. Keep the Change sometimes against tanks.
griff.gear: Reload Speed and Health. Gadget Charge underrated on certain maps.
griff.tips: Midrange wallbreaker. Use on any map you need a wallbreak + midrange on

grom.gadget: Radio Check. Watchtower is good for tanking or on grassy maps (why are you playing him on one?).

hank.gear: Gadget Charge and Damage. Hard to find chance to heal with Health so might as well keep up pressure.

janet.gear: Speed and Vision. Damage and Shield if not bushy map.

jessie.gadget: Spark plug. Recoil Spring in heist
jessie.gear: Damage and Pet Power in Heist. Damage/Shield/Speed anywhere else.

kit.gadget: Cheeseburger better due to cheese potential. Cardboard Box still good.
kit.starpower: Overly Attached in 3v3. Power Hungry in Showdown.

leon.gadget: Lollipop drop. Allows you to connect bushes and push up control. Team invis is super strong.
leon.starpower: Smoke Trails better for super cycling.

lola.starpower: Improvise better in this meta. Sealed with a Kiss underrated.

mandy.gadget: Caramelize. Cookie Crumbs good for surprise element.

max.starpower: Run and Gun. Super charged in knockout/bounty and quickfire.

meg.gadget: Jolting Volts to pressure enemy back. Toolbox good vs gene
meg.starpower: Heavy Metal against agro. Force Field against snipers.
meg.gear: Damage and Shield. Health can be good but hard to find chance to heal.

mico.gadget: Clipping screen 99% of time. Presto okay in niche scenarios.
mico.starpower: Monkey business. Record smash in heist.

mortis.starpower: Both good. Coiled snake better high elo.
mortis.gear: Shield and Bat Storm/Damage (if you're a good player).

nani.gadget: Return to Sender in bounty/knockout/vs snipers. Teleport in heist/brawl ball/gem grab.
nani.starpower: Autofocus in bounty/knockout. tempered steel other modes

nita.gadget: Faux Fur. Bear paws good vs tanks and in brawl ball
nita.starpower: Bear with me. Hyper bear in heist
nita.gear: Damage and speed. Pet power in heist.

pearl.starpower: Heat shield. Heat retention okay vs aggro

penny.starpower: Master blaster/heavy coffers equal. Blaster better vs aggro

piper.gadget: Auto aimer vs aggro/as default. Homemade recipe if no aggro

poco.starpower: Both good. Da capo great heals. Screeching solo if you play aggro.

r t.gadget: Hacks if long range. Out of line vs aggro or on maps like parallel plays/sneaky fields

rt.gadget: Hacks if long range. Out of line vs aggro or on maps like parallel plays/sneaky fields

rico.gadget: Multiball launcher. Bouncy castle okay vs only snipers
rico.starpower: Super Bouncy. Robo Retreat better if bad matchup (wall breakers, throwers, assassins).

rosa.gadget: Unfriendly Bushes. Grow Light depends on matchup (can benefit or hurt you).

ruffs.gadget: Air Support. Take Cover against snipers or Gene.
ruffs.starpower: Air superiority. Field promotion okay on knockout/bounty
ruffs.gear: Damage and Shield. Vision and Speed on grassy map.

shelly.starpower: Shell Shock. Band-Aid can be good on Showdown, Knockout, and Bounty. Neither really worth buying.

spike.gadget: Life plant. Popping pincushion on heist

squeak.starpower: Chain Reaction for damage in lanes. Super Sticky good as well.

stu.gadget: Speedzone for Hot Zone/Gem Grab. Breakthrough for aggressive gameplay and destroying map.
stu.starpower: Gasoheal. Zero drag vs snipers/long range

surge.gadget: Power Shield. Power Surge if against pros since hard to charge super.

tara.starpower: Healing Shade. Black Portal not bad against snipers.

tick.starpower: Well Oiled. Automa-tick reload if no enemy throwers/threats

willow.starpower: Love is Blind. Both are hard to get value from.

clancy.gadget: Snappy shooting. Earlier you get form, the more useful you are
